comment: Use capitalization and punctuation! They are on the keyboard and don't cost EXTRA to use!
amr:
# ::snt Use capitalization and punctuation! They are on the keyboard and don't cost EXTRA to use!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / capitalize-01)
                  :op2 (p / punctuate-01)
                  :snt2-of m))
      :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (t / they)
            :ARG2 (k / keyboard))
      :op2 (c2 / cost-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 t
            :ARG2 (e / EXTRA)
            :ARG3 (u2 / use-01)))
